page.title: 12LOCAL INDUSTRY/EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Light industries,Service industries and assembly industries form the bulk of Lytham's industries. Dudley industries make bathroom equipment.They export to Europe and Asia.They employ 140 employees.The Holt_Jackson's Book company employs 320 people.They stock 1/2 a million books.They distribute them all over the world.Cookson's Bakery,opened in 1886 costing{Â£35}.In 1930 it moved from Preston to Lytham.In 1954 Cooksons sold the buisness to Sunblest,who employ 350 people. The G.R.E. was formed by two assurance companies,the Guardian and The Royal Exchange.The G.R.E.'s head office is in Lytham.It consists of two blocks one of which has a large computer complex.The company also has a Sports and Social Club.Ditchburn organisation started in 1947.(Cont.)
